pages.text: Marmolatella is a medium-sized sea snail known from the Americas, Europe, and Asia. It's temporal range extends from at least the Carboniferous to the Jurassic. However, there is also a chance that Marmolatella could've stretched back farther to the Devonian.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Punch
